tags.name: client only
tags.description: only the client with client key can access

useCases.name: query categories(skip: number, take: number) should list paginated categories
mutation createCategory(name: string, description: string, image_id: string. image_url: string, inactive: boolean) should create a category

nestedUseCases.name: should return defined error if any inputs are invalid
categories(skip: number, take: number) should return defined error if take number is more than 1000

functionalRequirements.name: category repository.create method should create and return category
usecase for create category must return defined error if name input is invalid by having more than 253 characters
use case for create category must return the category created if inputs are valid

category resolver.create should return the created category or a defined error by passing name, description, image_id, image_url, inactive, and return the category with additional id, created_at and updated_at
category repository.list should list categories by amount
use case for categories list must  must return the listed categories if inputs are valid
resolver for categories list should return a defined error or a list of categories by passing skip and take
use case for categories list should return defined error if take number is more than 1000

useCases.name: receive a query for loginAttempt passing clientKey in header authorization bearer, and returns the state for the attempt, and the expiration time for it

receive a mutation with [state:string] for loginAttemptRetrieve, and after checking and deleting the record for that state, return operationResponse with status sucess, and if state check don't pass return status fail with the message
mutation for loginRegistration receiving accessToken and the client key, returns a register of the last login from the user, and the user id
receive a query for listLoginRegistries(skip: number, take: number, accessToken: string), returning paginated login registries of the user

functionalRequirements.name: resolver for query loginAttempt passing clientKey in header authorization bearer, should call Client authorization use case and then return a object with {state:string, expiration: string} property from the operation usecase after executing it
use case for loginAttemptInit should return an object with {state: string, expiration: string} from the user repository
repository for user.createState should return an object with {state: string, expiration: string} after creating the record in redis
use case for retrieveState should return operationResponse with sucess status and string message, or fail status with message if retrieve fails
respository for users.retrieveState should return null if retrieve fails or the retrieved state after deleting it if exists

resolver for mutation loginAttemptRetrieve receiving the state and the client id, should call authorization fot he clientid, and then return operationResponse from the operation usecase with status string success if state exist, fail if dont, and the message

resolver mutation for loginRegistration after authorizing client key and the access token and storing a login record in the database for the given user (that uses "sub" token payload as ID for the user table), recording the date of the login, but before it, check if user exists and if don't, create a user in the database with that id, then store the login registry, then returns a register of the login registry
use case for checkAccessToken should check if the token is valid and return the decoded token if it is
use case for createUser(id: string)  should return the created user data, after creating it in the database
use case for createLoginRegistry(id:string) should create and return the login registry created for that user
use case for listLoginRegistries(take:number=2,skip:number=0) should return an array of login registries of default size 2, being of size of at least 1 for new user.
user repo for createUser(id: string)  should return the created user data, after creating it in the database
repo for user.createLoginRegistry(id:string) should create the login registry for that id and return the data inserted
repo for user.listLoginRegistries(take:number=2,skip:number=0) should return an array of login registries of default size 2
use case for findUserById(id: string) should return the user with that Id
repo for user.findUserById should return the user with that Id or null if not found
use case for checkClientKey should return an object with a boolean indicating passed or don't, and if don't, return a value with an object for unauthorizedClient.

useCases.name: receive a mutation for createImage receiving user identification and the name:String,  description,  tags      Json array,  image_url    String. and returns the created image data of that user that don't failed the authorization.

functionalRequirements.name: resolver for mutation createImage receiving client key, user identification and the name:String,  description,  tags      Json array,  image_url    String. and returns the created image data of that user that don't failed the authorization, so the flow is call user authorization, call createImage usecase, and then return the created image data.
use case for createImage receiving userId ,name,  description,  tags, and image_url. returns the created image data.
repo for Image.create receiving all image needed data should return the created image
